title: Emerald Bloom Diamond Haar
features: A delicate and modern take on the classic Haaram, featuring a cascade of floral motifs meticulously set with shimmering diamonds. The centerpiece features a vibrant Zambian emerald, adding a pop of color and regal elegance. Accented with lustrous freshwater pearls for a touch of timeless beauty. Features a delicate and stylish pattern set to give the Haar a lightweight look. The design beautifully marries traditional floral patterns with contemporary aesthetics, creating a versatile piece.
occasions: and other special occasions where you want to make a statement. Also ideal for modern brides looking for a unique take on traditional bridal jewelry
description: This necklace is a harmonious blend of tradition and modern design, making it a unique and versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The high-quality diamonds and emeralds guarantee lasting brilliance and value. The intricate craftsmanship and attention to detail reflect the rich heritage of Hyderabadi jewelry, offering a timeless elegance that will be treasured for generations.
